name: All new message channel must be into a permission list (PeopleSoft)
description: Objects (Message Channel) created by the project should be at least in one permission list (AuthChnlMon)
output: This report lists all the Message Chanels not in a permission list
rationale: To give access to the object, it must be referenced by a permission list
remediation: Check the design of the permission lists and add the object to the corresponding one
alternativeName: All new message channel must be into a permission list (PeopleSoft)

qualityStandards.name: Improper access control (such as insecure direct object references, failure to restrict URL access, directory traversal, and failure to restrict user access to functions).
Improper access control (such as insecure direct object references, failure to restrict URL access, directory traversal, and failure to restrict user access to functions).
The application must enforce approved authorizations for logical access to information and system resources in accordance with applicable access control policies.
